generated_body: The article likely discusses a recent inquiry in the U.K. regarding the practices of Roman Catholic priests and their obligations under child protection laws. It may detail testimonies given during the inquiry, specifically addressing the stance that priests will not break the seal of confession to report instances of child abuse. This could involve discussions on the implications of this position for safeguarding children and the potential conflicts between religious doctrine and legal responsibilities. The article may also explore differing opinions on this issue within the church and society at large.
